website_summaries.verdict: Moms-to-be who want to hit the gym throughout their pregnancy should consider this support belt from Gabrialla.
pros: Reduces lower back pain through compression and hip support
6-inch deep pockets allow heat or cooling therapy packs inside the belt
Helps lessen the depth and amount of stretch marks
Helps with walking, running, and active cardio
cons: Makes bending down even more difficult
Must remove to use the restroom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Running
customer_reviews.text: I use this belt for running. It has helped me tremendously continue to stay active. I wish I would have bought it sooner. I started wearing this when I was 7 months pregnant and I am currently 37 weeks. I will be running a 5k next weekend at my 38 week mark! The belt has helped keep my baby bump stable and relieved the pressure from baby on my bladder while running!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great but make sure what your size is !!
customer_reviews.text: I like this belt very much now I have less pain in my back. But the measuring is not accurate. My measuring card is different on the app and also different on the other customer’s card. So my belt is little bit small and it will come smaller day after day until the due date. So I have to buy another one . The seller give me card with 20% discount for next purchase but the site in the card is not working. And I cannot use this discount.
customer_reviews.author: GHADA

customer_reviews.title: Has helped a ton in relieving my lower back pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Has helped a ton in relieving my lower back pain during my pregnancy. I bought this when I was 18 weeks, when my bump first popped out. Wish I had thought to get it a sooner. I ordered a medium and it's perfectly fit with room to grow for me (I'm 5'5" 120 lbs pre pregnancy; 137lbs 27 weeks in)
customer_reviews.author: PNaz

customer_reviews.title: Read this Mom - From a Dad
customer_reviews.text: First, wear it correctly. Second, give it a few tries to get the fit right. Third, if you do the first two it may work for you. Every pregnancy is different, however, if you are all belly for your pregnancy and have ligament pains, this may work for you as it did my wife! Wear it like the picture shows (thinner section in the front) and don’t be afraid to adjust the straps. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Brown

customer_reviews.title: Gives enough support
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It gives enough support for my belly and back. However, at the end of the day I feel too much pressure on my belly, so I can really wear it for the whole day. Also, it wasn't very comfortable for me to sit for a long time in it - it is always starting sliding a little bit. But yet, this is the best belt for me so far, so I am not returning it and still using it
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium. I'm about 36" around my middle section now and just started my third trimester. The medium fit VERY snug--there's NO WAY it will continue to fit as my abdomen expands. It did feel very stiff and secure, though. I wouldn't plan on wearing it on bare skin, since I'm sure the fabric would cause sweating and chafing.
customer_reviews.author: Linseaweed

customer_reviews.title: Not Relieving for Me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I just couldn't get this to fit correctly or what, but I never felt relief when wearing this (starting at 33+ wks pregnant). In fact, it must have held my muscles in such a different position than my body was used to because I had severe pain throughout my lower back and legs after wearing this for walks over the course of a weekend (and I went into the Dr to confirm this was not related to preterm labor or anything more serious - the only thing different I could point to was this band).
customer_reviews.author: Lucy W.

customer_reviews.title: Provides great pregnancy experience
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bandage. I use it almost every day since 28 weeks of pregnancy: running, walking, gardening. I even danced in it at the dance class! Don’t know how I would live comfortable pregnant life without this belt! Thanks for such product! Money spent on it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: DUKALIDUKA

customer_reviews.title: Works and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective! Such a blessing! Thanks. Measure your belly and anticipate growth. I’m petite (size 3) and measured 37” at 22 circumference at 22weeks pregnancy and bought medium. It fits and expect will fit for rest of pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: T L

customer_reviews.title: Helps for overweight guys like me
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a pregnant woman. I’m an overweight man. I strap this on to help lift up my FUPA so I can reach my penis to pee. It’s worked wonderfully. No more dribbling!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Doyle

customer_reviews.title: This belt provides excellent support and instantaneous relief
customer_reviews.text: This belt is saving my life right now. I am 23 weeks pregnant with second baby and I have a lot of pain in my lower back and abdomen. This belt provides excellent support and instantaneous relief. My doctor said I can ware it all day and all night if I want but I do take it off at night. The only cons I have is that it is a little bit big and feels awkward when you sit, and you cannot really ware it on bare skin but other than that it is great. I was size 0 before pregnancy and I bought size Medium and it fits great and I still have room for my ever-expanding belly.
customer_reviews.author: Sylwia Stachura

customer_reviews.title: I was having very bad back and lower abdomen pain
customer_reviews.text: At 28 weeks pregnant, I was having very bad back and lower abdomen pain. My doctor suggested I get a maternity belt and it's been amazing. I've been wearing it for a week now and my pain has subsided. It gives me that extra support that I need. I highly recommend this product if you're having any back or abdomen pain. It's been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: MissyF

customer_reviews.title: Helped me be able to workout entire pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Without this, I don't know that I would've been able to continue working out towards the end with all the back pain. This was so good that I worked out up until the day before my daughter was born. I found that it was bulky under my clothes so I only wore it to work out and wore it over my workout clothes because who cares when you are pregnant, right? I wore a smaller band (not as wide) that didn't not show as much in my clothes for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

customer_reviews.title: Great for runners--needs instructions on how to wear it
customer_reviews.text: This belt provides excellent support for my growing belly. I use it when running or working out briskly. Keeps my abs from feeling strained. Fits to size with no issues. I just wish they provided instructions as to how to put it on--it's confusing if you put it below your belly or across it, and directions are hard to come by. I asked my doctor for guidance (under the belly, fyi!). Aside from lacking that, it's a great product for a wonderful price. Yay Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MLG9311

customer_reviews.title: Like wearing stiff sandpaper
customer_reviews.text: Took this out of the box and immediately knew I had to return it. It’s described as soft but it is hard, stiff and scratchy. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Support, just make sure you order the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt! The velcro is versatile and wide enough to strap anywhere around the waist so you always get a perfect fit. It stays put, even when i run and i don't feel like my belly is jiggling or my baby is getting whiplash! My only complaint is that maternity clothes are sized so you buy your normal, pre-pregnancy size. I thought i could do the same with this belt and that is NOT the case. You will need to buy a larger size than you think!
customer_reviews.author: Salamander_girl

customer_reviews.title: Great support belt!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this support belt to wear for running during my third pregnancy. It has been working very well, and I have been able to continue running even at 22 weeks. I am hoping to make it to at least 28 weeks, but we shall see. I fully intend to wear this for additional support every day towards the end of the pregnancy too! For those wondering about size, I usually wear a size small in maternity clothing and am 5'4" 120 pre-pregnancy. At 135lbs, the medium fits me perfectly with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Cadey Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Great for runners!
customer_reviews.text: I find this maternity belt very good for back and belly support. Does not slide up. Adjustable straps so I don't feel constricted, yet I felt supported by it during my runs. I've worn it for up to 10k runs only as well as during my babymoon when I knew I'd be on my feet a lot. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jmd109

customer_reviews.title: Great support for mom to be in the move
customer_reviews.text: Has great support, helps with back pain and allows me to keep walking and moving during pregnancy. Hard to sit down with it and not breathable but good support!
customer_reviews.author: NEL

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: I'm 22 weeks pregnant with my second, so I'm a little bigger at this point than I was last time. I was having a hard time after running with ligament soreness in the pelvic region, and this belt has definitely helped. I'm still a little sore adter some runs but it's gone from "not able to move" sore to manageable/minor soreness thanks to this belt. As far as how it feels, it's fairly comfortable. It stays put while running too! However I don't think I'd be able to wear it under everyday clothes unless they were loose otherwise it would be noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: MaryHelen

customer_reviews.title: I am soooo pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo pleased with this! I shopped around and was thinking about the Belly Bandit Upsie but thought it didn't fit well and was way too expensive. I found this an alternative and feel that its much more comfortable then the Belly Bandit and really helps with my lower back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Runners
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and talked to many fellow female distance runners and everyone recommended this product. Now that I wear it to run at least 3x a week I see why! It's awesome. I feel a huge difference when I wear it and when I dont! Only one recommendation would be not to use it until you're about 15+ weeks or so. Until the baby has risen up in the tummy it really doesn't help much. It just kind of pushes the baby in and I'm sure that's not fun for your little one! Once you start to get bigger this thing works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: ABV

customer_reviews.title: I was so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews for different maternity supports and decided to purchase this one. I was so glad that I did! This support belt was incredibly helpful during my third trimester. It relieved strain in my lower back as well as supported my belly after the baby "dropped". I was on my feet all day for work and started wearing the support belt--it truly made a difference for me. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life-changing product for me in my second pregnancy. By 20 weeks my belly felt so heavy, I found myself supporting it with my hands and, predictably, also experiencing back pain, which I do not normally have. I have worn this belt everyday for almost three weeks and my discomfort and pain have disipaited completely. When I received the product I couldn't imagine it would be comfortable or helpful, but even working at a desk all day I forget that I am wearing it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You should definitely do one size up from whatever you ...
customer_reviews.text: You should definitely do one size up from whatever you are. I wore it a few times and it seemed to alleviate my back. Now that I'm 7 months pregnant with twins, I can't seem to find anything that really helps. But it's worth trying, it may work well for some ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Bairagee

customer_reviews.title: Works for Standing, Not Sitting
customer_reviews.text: I use it for support when I am standing or walking for long periods, and it helps with my maternity pelvic pain. However, it causes more pain if I sit with it on, so I take it off for driving, eating, or if I will be switching between being down and up. I would like to try a different one, but it does the job most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: SillyMRS

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to find a size chart
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to find a size chart for this item before ordering. I ordered a medium, which is what I wear in everything in everything, and it is too small. I am in my 3rd trimester though. Because my back pain was so intense I paid for the extra shipping and then was very disappointed. It does look well made and I will try another size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable and supportive. I wear it when I'm walking a lot or working out. Helps with relieving some low back pain I've been getting. Material is a little thick but I don't find it too warm to wear but also hasn't been that hot out.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Works great for running and walking
customer_reviews.text: Works great for running and walking. I am 5'4 125 pre preg and got the medium and it has room to grow. Have been wearing since 5 months and am almost 7 now.
customer_reviews.author: Pariya Fazeli

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. We got it in the mail when she was 7 months pregnant coming off a c-section 14 months earlier. (I know, I know.) The product is high quality and well thought out. I would definitely recommend it. One thing to note is that she has difficulty sitting down while wearing it. I don't think the product was intended to be used sitting down so I'm still giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Description of sizing was not correct so now I have to return for a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good things about this product
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product. I wore this EVERYDAY for the last 5 months of my pregnancy. I couldn't live without it, it provided the best support for my back!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Sousa

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I used the belt from week 22 through week 38. I didn't show enough to keep the belt in place before week 22 but once I had enough of a bump to keep the belt in place, I used it almost daily. I ran regularly through week 35 and walked extensively after that. I stopped wearing it at week 38 so that it wouldn't keep my baby from dropping and preparing for L&D. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: tnkrbl10

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This did wonders! Would recommend it to anyone. It really held well unlike others I had used!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lee

customer_reviews.title: kept me running
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife so this is how she describes it: It is sturdy and comfortable and she can feel a big difference when she runs. She said it wasn't restrictive and the sizing was accurate. She runs and wears it everyday, and it has held up well. Her only complaint was that it didn't come with washing instructions.
customer_reviews.author: burford

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had worked better for me
customer_reviews.text: This belt was not as good as I had hoped. I purchased it because I have been having cramping and abdominal pain during my runs and exercise. I have not really noticed an improvement when I wear it, and I have noticed that it makes me have to urinate more because of where it presses on me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie d'Albenas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable, specially when sit down. It's very hard...unfortunately I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ElenaDC

customer_reviews.title: Returned this - Caused more discomfort than the relief it ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned this - Caused more discomfort than the relief it provided. I am 5'2", so maybe Im just not long enough in the torso.
customer_reviews.author: jvic

customer_reviews.title: it fits nicely under your clothes
customer_reviews.text: This belt provides me comfort. My stomach feels so heavy so when I need the support, I use it to take the stress off my back and my pelvic area. I would suggest this belt to anyone looking for a little comfort. Also, it fits nicely under your clothes, it not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I definitely notice a difference in the way ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I definitely notice a difference in the way I feel at the end of the day if I have worn it or not. I am 30 weeks and having noticeable pelvic pain and it has made a big improvement. Glad I got it and it was more affordable than some of the other belts I had looked at.
customer_reviews.author: roofersmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for back and belly
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a 100lbs and I ordered a s/m I'm 140lbs now and it still fits perfectly and it supports my belly and back great. I didn't give it 5 stars simply bc the end of my belt always scratches me and wish something could be done with that. Other than that I wear it all day everyday just take it off when I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie B.

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive!
customer_reviews.text: Great relief for day to day back and lower abdominal pain!
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love this band
customer_reviews.text: Love this band. I use it mainly for running but since I'm not showing yet, I've used it mainly for back pain and my posture. It makes the world of difference. It has been sliding up over my hips a lot since I don't have much of a tummy for it to support.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: ... be too bulky for my needs and not as comfortable running as other belts I tried
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be too bulky for my needs and not as comfortable running as other belts I tried. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: kristin k.

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercising
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps with round ligament pain while exercising. I do not have much back pain yet, but I can tell the support will likely help with that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kala F

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on or toss in a bag for ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have made it through my second pregnancy without it. Adjustable, easy to put on or toss in a bag for just in case.
customer_reviews.author: BobJ

customer_reviews.title: Allowing me to continue to run
customer_reviews.text: As I neared the end of my second trimester my lower back was bothering me after running, and I could barely make it a mile without stopping to pee (which takes some time to plan a run that includes bathroom facilites every mile or so). This support belt was supportive and comfortable. I was a little concerned when it first arrived because it did not seem to be very soft and comfortable - but I gave it a try and love it. Now just into 28 weeks and still able to run in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Worked out all the way with baby number 3!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Racine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with pregnancy hip pain, gives me support while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: TeamO

customer_reviews.title: Good Belt
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived fast, it is made of durable and quality material and is very adjustable which is nice. I Bought one size up since I was in my 3rd trimester and it was perfect with room to expand if needed.
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: This thing did not fit according to the measurements. On top of that, it didn't give me any of the support I needed.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is great for round ligament pain. I haven't had any serious pain since I've had it. It's just supportive enough to feel good, but not too restrictive. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: I like but....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for extra support during my workouts. I do feel more supported however, there are some exercises I have to take it off to do (i.e. anything with low squats or higher legs) which sort of defeats the purpose. I am planning on using it later in pregnancy once my belly gets heavier to help hold up the weight but based on some of the previous reviews, it's not comfortable to sit in and if you have a job that requires sitting and standing, it may not be that useful. I'm still glad I have it but then again I work out every day.
customer_reviews.author: Chitowngirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome to help the pressure when running and walking later in pregnancy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for relieving back/flank discomfort during exercise
customer_reviews.text: When I started to develop right sided flank/lower back pain at about 24 weeks as my belly got bigger, I was having trouble exercising or walking for a prolonged period of time. This belt did a great job of helping relieve this discomfort. It was not very comfortable when sitting down because it dug into the bottom of my belly, but I really only wore it during exercise so this was not a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is awesome. I had a different brand for my first pregnancy but it's too big. I ordered this one after I read that pregnant runners recommended it. It's been great so far. I use it for all my work outs - running and lifting. Going to order another one to wear for every day. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S. Collier

customer_reviews.title: great support
customer_reviews.text: best one I have found and I have bought quite a few. Not constricting or bulky, Love the pocket for heat or ice pack
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: Backache
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable and it's far too bulky for any job other than sitting at a computer desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It works great and gives my belly a lot of support
customer_reviews.text: I'm 28wks pregnant and use the support belt for running. It works great and gives my belly a lot of support!
customer_reviews.author: alorenc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Let's me still go for runs even at 37 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now I can run again at 30 weeks pregnant. Game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It completely met my expectations. Gives the extra support I need when working out
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support...can get uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The band does really help with support but it creases at the waist line after a while and the elastic tabs become uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This belt as helped me sleep. I've been wearing it to so my tail bone doesn't hurt as much and goodness it feels so good. I haven't had the best sleep in so long before this belt. This belt is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: PaFoua

customer_reviews.title: I love this belt
customer_reviews.text: "I love this belt , when I put it on it felt amazing , but for a personal reasons my Dr didn't let me use the belt :( and I had to return it back, seller was great and very understandable not problems at all , I have got my money back pretty soon."
customer_reviews.author: Ana h

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, provides support
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, they don't really specify how to choose size so although I probably would've picked a small (not pregnant), I went with a medium and it works.
customer_reviews.author: SPenn

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! I'm on my feet for ten hours a day and the band really helps with lower back pain and my sciatica. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Carr

customer_reviews.title: Life savor!!! I took the strap that ...
customer_reviews.text: Life savor!!! I took the strap that goes over belly off. So much more comfy! Wish they had it in black.
customer_reviews.author: Jenesa D. Stayton

customer_reviews.title: Best belt out there!
customer_reviews.text: I've been running with this belt since maybe 24 weeks with my second child. I'm still going at 31. It is great! My doctor told me it's the best out there for it's double belt system.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I only use the belt for jogging. I'm only 23 weeks now, so I may use it at work (where I'm constantly on my feet) for support later. I have been so happy with the belt!
customer_reviews.author: Randie L Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It helps me when I go on long walks. I don't have to carry my belly
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Landeros-Cruz

customer_reviews.title: love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly, comfortable and works exactly how i wanted it to. I run and it instantly helped with extra pressure. and the product came way faster then expected. great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Good support for pregnant runners.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, relieves discomfort associated with the round ligament. 8 months pregnant and still running. I have to adjust the brace location, in order to remain comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Farmer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Its a good band. it offters medium support but its a but bulky to wear under clothes. I use it to workout, long walks or heavy house work.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Rengifo

customer_reviews.title: Total Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped the pressure of my belly hanging on my c-section scar. Carrying a boy is so different!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Szczudlo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This band has been great for running while pregnant. I don't think I could run without it!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Pazdan

customer_reviews.title: im sure ill use it
customer_reviews.text: I used the other buyers' review to get the right sizing. don't quite need it now, but I'm sure Ill be in need in the months to come!
customer_reviews.author: HIGirl

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: This item runs small, is difficult to put on, and the fabric is scratchy. I wouldn't recommend it for anyone much less a pregnant lady who it is intended for. The SI support is ample, but the negative aspects make that support useless since I won't be wearing the item.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: seems supportive. but got a white instead but it says it is black!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black but received a white instead. :( The product it self, just used for half day and it seems pretty supportive.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t offer support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews and also because I wanted to continue exercising while pregnant. I shouldn’t have wasted my money. When I put this on I get more exercise-related pain than I would without it. The whole of my lower belly hurts and aches until I take it off. I have tried to wear it looser, tighter, move positions, but nothing helps. Also, I suffer from lower back pain and this has done absolutely nothing to help that. A total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works for walking fast
customer_reviews.text: When I tried this in my 2nd trimester it did nothing but it definitely provides some support in the 3rd trimester. It relieves some pain and tension i experienced on my long walks. I originally bought it to run in but I'm not running anymore, so I can't vouch for it's use while running. I don't think it'd be comfortable for running, though.
customer_reviews.author: Julia T

customer_reviews.title: Support I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the support! I've used it at my cardio kick classes and for running. I've even used it on days where my back feels out of whack or we're doing projects around the house. It even has velcro on both sides so it can be tightened as necessary once you're wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: I used it after my appendectomy.
customer_reviews.text: It made it so much easier and faster to recover. I could move about with ease and comfort and even slot better with the feeling of snug-comfort. I got back to normal quickly. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: 1farstar

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this belt when I started to cramp up in my lower abdomen while exercising in my 5/6th month. It definitely serves its purpose in that regard, but I've noticed that lately, when I bend over or sit, the velcro pulls apart, and I'm not even that big yet!!! I don't know if this is due to prolonged use (I use it every day, working out twice a day), but that is certainly annoying considering it's supposed to accommodate a growing belly, but otherwise, generally fulfills a very practical and helpful purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Pcelica063

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pregnancy (8.5 months now) and for a while there, I was quite miserable. My OB/GYN suggested purchasing a maternity belt, something I'd never heard of, stating it would lift my very low hanging tummy and give me needed back support. It did that and more. I can breathe again! Plus, I have worn it under everything from cotton t-shirts to silk blouses and no one detected a thing - I asked. I'd definitely suggest this item to expecting, low-hanging mothers. My only cautionary words would be to be careful regarding the two velcro straps that hang from the side; one side can catch onto your clothing and mess up the fabric a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to keep running during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful piece of equipment to provide some comfort for running during pregnancy. It has cut down on my soreness a lot during and after my runs. The only reason for 4 stars is it didn't or hasn't eliminated the pain/ discomfort, which maybe is too much to expect. I like the adjustability of it. And I got the medium at the recommendations I saw here and that appears to be a perfect size. I tend to wear size 4 or 6 pants pre-pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: E Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Good pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Provides significant pain relief. Feels slightly tight but likely due to belly size
customer_reviews.author: steven salvatore

customer_reviews.title: great for 3rd trimester - very useful gift for baby showers
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a pregnant mommy in her 3rd trimester where pelvic pain was starting to get real serious. It helps redistribute the weight from a big belly onto the waist. In effect, it decreases the strain on your spine and lumbar muscles and puts the burden more to your legs. Very comfy and durable. Very effective. This should actually be part of a must-have list for baby showers!
customer_reviews.author: Super Duper

customer_reviews.title: Did not help
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with my back and hip pain during pregnancy...and it kinda did not help. Maybe this is a user error or something .... But I tried this for running ....saw no improvement.. Tried day to day ..nope So...a strog dislike from me.
customer_reviews.author: Prof Allison

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought for support to relieve round ligament pain when running while pregnant, but all it did was squish my bladder 😩
customer_reviews.author: Thetallthriftymama

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I began wearing a size medium at around 5 months of pregnancy and then recently went to the large during my seventh month because I was in between sizes and the medium was getting pretty snug. It has been wonderful for exercising and overall support while I'm doing activities that require long bouts of standing, like cooking dinner or going shopping. It is not comfortable for sitting, bending over, or for wearing under your clothes, but I don't think that is it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: zigley

customer_reviews.title: It's great quality and held everything in
customer_reviews.text: I used this band to run while I was pregnant. It's great quality and held everything in. Just be sure not to wear it too tight.
customer_reviews.author: K3morse

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this while jogging and it helps hold my baby belly and prevent too much bouncing :)
customer_reviews.author: Kara Marie

customer_reviews.title: I was having horrible pain in my hips and lower back/tailbone with my ...
customer_reviews.text: This belt was a life saver! I was having horrible pain in my hips and lower back/tailbone with my second pregnancy. This belt gave me immediate relief and after a few days I only wore the belt if I knew I was going to be on my feet a lot. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ANDev08

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this maternity belt to try to alleviate some of the back pain late in my pregnancy. I worked in retail through my whole pregnancy so I was on my feet all day. I didn't feel a difference with this belt, but my belly never got to be huge. It might be more effective on a larger baby belly.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this while I was pregnant. I work on my feet 40 hours a week and then I have 2 kids that Im running around everywhere. My third pregnancy was rough and this made it so much more bearable and helped me get through each day on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Only wore once and it hurt my back and ribs like crazy! Wish I had returned product
customer_reviews.text: Was dissapointed with the sizing chart, I followed the measurements but it was too small. Only wore once and it hurt my back and ribs like crazy! Wish I had returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Cute

customer_reviews.title: I accidentally ordered a med, but never grew big ...
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered a med, but never grew big enough for it to really work. It did help my posture though
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend this belt for any pregnant woman who is started ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pregnant with twins, and this gives me the extra support I need when out running errands or walking the dog. Would highly recommend this belt for any pregnant woman who is started to experience some lower back or pelvic pain.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGirl87

customer_reviews.title: great support
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time runner. The farther I got into my pregnancy, the more my growing belly pressed onto my bladder. This belt has helped take the pressure off & minimize bathroom trips during runs!
customer_reviews.author: LSU Lady

product_meta.title: Gabrialla Elastic Maternity/Back Support Belt MS-96
product_meta.description: Gabrialla Maternity Support Belt: Medium Support (6andquot; Wide) - Beige GABRIALLA Maternity Support Belt creates warmth and increased blood flow to the lower back, thus encouraging flexible muscles and therapeutic healing. By providing support and compression to the hips, the garment helps to stabilize the weakened hip area and reduce pain. It provides excellent support to the uterus and reduces back pain. andbull; Helps reduce the risk of stretch marksandbull; 6andquot; wide in the back with pocket for hotorcold therapy reliefandbull; Comfortable for everyday use and unnoticeable under clothesandbull; Adjustable to accommodate size changes during and after pregnancyandbull; Highly recommended by Doctors as an excellent abdominal and lower back supportandbull; Promotes proper posture and balance while allowing you to continue an active lifestyleandbull; Soft elastic material makes comfortable to wear on a daily basis and unnoticeable under clothesConditions:Pregnancy, lower back pain, abdominal pain, stretch marksSize Chart:Small: 28andquot; - 32andquot;Medium: 32 1or2andquot; - 36andquot;Large: 36 1or2andquot; - 40 1or2andquot;X-Large: 41andquot; - 45 1or2andquot;XX-Large: 46andquot; - 50 1or2andquot;Measure circumference midway between waist and hips
feature_bullets: MADE IN THE USA - Polyester 80% / Lycra 20%

DESIGNED WITH STYLE IN MIND - Comfortable and flexible, perfect for everyday use and can be adjusted to accommodate your body as it changes. The MS-96i is cotton lined and approved for use under clothing, while the MS-96 is elastic lined for use over clothing.
PREGNANCY WITH FEWER STRETCH MARKS - In addition to helping support proper posture, the belt is designed to reduce the risk of stretch marks.
CREATED FOR ACTIVE MOMS - A great exercising belt for moms that provides extra support during their workout as well as more stability and balance.
COMFORTABLE PREGNANCY - Features a back pocket for cold and hot therapy relief and a warming design that increases blood flow to the lower back, loosens muscles and reduces pain.
